mapper.select: select m.menu_id,m.menu_name,m.menu_url,m.parent_id from t_menu as m,t_relation as r where m.menu_id=r.menu_id and m.parent_id=#{param1} and r.role_id=#{param2}

select w.worker_id,w.worker_account,w.worker_password,w.worker_name,w.worker_phone,w.worker_age,w.worker_sex,w.worker_address,w.worker_state, w.role_id,(select r.role_name from t_role as r where w.role_id=r.role_id) roleName from t_worker as w where w.worker_account = #{workerAccount} and w.worker_password=#{workerPassword} limit 1
